metadata.title: CVE-2024-47671 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:USB: usbtmc: prevent kernel-usb-infoleakThe syzbot reported a kernel-usb-infoleak in usbtmc_write,we need to clear the structure before filling fields.
